game

Class Battlefield

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Battlefield

  • public class Battlefield
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles the battlefield for a player.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Group 1 - DAT055 2014

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Battlefield(java.lang.String id, ZoneListener zoneListener)
      Construct the battlefield with 100 zones.

      Return the ship at the specified coordinates.

      Get a matrix with all the zones.

      Check if the zone with the specified coordinates is occupied by a ship.

      Check if the zone with the specified coordinates has been bombed.

      Clears the zone with the specified coordinates in the GUI.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Battlefield

        public Battlefield(java.lang.String id,
           ZoneListener zoneListener)
        Construct the battlefield with 100 zones.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the owner of the battlefield
        zoneListener - The ZoneListener object used to update the GUI.

    • Method Detail

      • getZones

        public Zone[][] getZones()
        Get a matrix with all the zones.
        Returns:
        The matrix

      • isBombed

        public boolean isBombed(int x,
               int y)
        Check if the zone with the specified coordinates has been bombed.
        Parameters:
        x - The x-coordinate of the zone
        y - The y-coordinate of the zone
        Returns:
        true if the zone has been bombed, false otherwise

      • setBomb

        public GameEngine.LastShot setBomb(int x,
                          int y)
        Bomb the zone with the specified coordinates and sink the ship if it was sunk.
        Parameters:
        x - The x-coordinate of the zone
        y - The y-coordinate of the zone
        Returns:
        MISS, HIT or SUNK

      • hasShip

        public boolean hasShip(int x,
              int y)
        Check if the zone with the specified coordinates is occupied by a ship.
        Parameters:
        x - The x-coordinate of the zone
        y - The y-coordinate of the zone
        Returns:
        true if a ship occupies the zone, false if the zone is free

      • getShip

        public Ship getShip(int x,
           int y)
        Return the ship at the specified coordinates.
        Parameters:
        x - The x-coordinate of the zone
        y - The y-coordinate of the zone
        Returns:
        Ship or null if there is no ship

      • setShip

        public void setShip(int x,
           int y,
           Ship ship)
        Place a ship at the specified coordinates.
        Parameters:
        x - The x-coordinate of the zone
        y - The y-coordinate of the zone
        ship - The ship occupying the zone

      • sinkShip

        public void sinkShip(Ship ship)
        Sink a ship on the battlefield.
        Parameters:
        ship - The ship that shall be sunk

      • showShips

        public void showShips()
        Show all ships on this battlefield that are hidden.
